Uses of Class
com.jalios.jcms.handler.QueryHandler

  • Packages that use QueryHandler 
    Package Description
    com.jalios.jcms
    Contains the core JPlatform classes.
    com.jalios.jcms.db  
    com.jalios.jcms.handler
    Contains the javabean classes uses to process HTTP request (aka form handlers).
    com.jalios.jcms.mail  
    com.jalios.jcms.media
    Contains all the classes to provide the Media Browser.
    com.jalios.jcms.search
    Provides internal search engines classes of JPlatform.
    com.jalios.jcms.search.queryparser  
    com.jalios.jcms.taglib
    Provides many of the classes used for JPlatform jsp tags.
    com.jalios.jcms.trash  
    com.jalios.jcms.webpage
